channel.title: Products on MEOW!
channel.description: Recent content in Products on MEOW!

item.title: Data
item.description: Whether you are brand new to broadband or you are an expert in Outside Plant (OSP) you want to know what you are in for. Where do you need to construct? Where do you need to get access? Who are you going to connect? You can answer these questions easily with spatial data. broadband.cat offers three (3) data products. 1KM hexagon aggregation Example Street segment hexagon aggregation Example Network route lines Example Each of these data sets come with a breakdown by route type.
